  1. Home
  2. Reports
  3. GDN
  4. SmartMatch Leverage Report

The SmartMatch Leverage report shows you the number of words in a project automatically translated by SmartMatch for a selected date range. An account-level version of this report is also available.

To run the report, select Languages and a date range and click Filter.

edit
